get.description: Use the MongoDB Atlas Search feature to search for Recipes involving the specified query and return details on all those documents. Each document returned has a _score property indicating the relevance.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Response body contains error details.

get.description: Use the MongoDB Atlas Search feature to search for Recipes involving the specified query and return a list of all values stored under the specified property in those documents. Each object returned has a _score property indicating the relevance of the most relevant document it came from and a value property containing the actual value.

400.description: Invalid property name specified in the request. Response body contains error details.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Response body contains error details.

get.description: Use the MongoDB Atlas Search feature to search for Recipes involving the specified query and return a list of all distinct values stored under the specified property in those documents. Each object returned has a _score property indicating the relevance of the most relevant document it came from and a value property containing the actual value.
